response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. Given its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a generous offer considering the product's true worth of $12,000 to you, and I am hopeful it will facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 11000}
